entry.title: New Blog
entry.summary: Just a quick intro to the new blog.
entry.content:
Decided to start writing a new blog for a few reasons: -

  • Fancied Learning RST and Pelican
  • Forces me to learn git
  • My girlfriend hates listening to my rants

So I will be ranting here mainly about pentesting. But as I am about to leave my current company to join forces with a collegue and start our own consultancy I imagine there will be a lot of moaning about how difficult it is to sell pentesting!!
